text:
First when I started doing research on my future studies, I search what I am interested about in my every day life. And I found out that what excite me the most is communicate and share with my friends, my family on subject that we have in common, like music, movies, fashion, but also news, politics and geopolitics situations. Thus I realized that wanted to be "in the information", for me it is like leraning new things about everything, but also share it with people, not only thanks to debats or discussions but also by artistic ways like photographie.                                                                                                                                                                                        I, then persue my research on famous photojournalists such as Alex Dupont or projects like the vietnamese girl running away from gaz during VietNam war. I was so excited about how those photographers work, what they have been through to capturate the best cliche to witness other's situations, and make the internationale community listen to what those humans have to say in a world within they are almost invisible.                                                                                                                         I know that nowadays photojournalism can be a hard job because of concurence linked to technologies revolutions such as numeric photo and smartphones. So to be safer on my futur job's choice, I chose to follow this cursus to aquere basis on communication professions, and then I would like to continu in journalism school to excerce this very important and crucial, in our actual world, profession.
Alex Dupont
